alert.note: Alert for Eastern Orleans; Upper Jefferson; Upper Plaquemines; Upper St. Bernard; Western Orleans (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued January 02 at 9:05PM CST until January 03 at 10:00AM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CST MONDAY... ...WIND ADVISORY HAS EXPIRED... * WHAT...Temperatures in the lower 30s expected. * WHERE...Upper Terrebonne County, and Iberville, Ascension, Assumption, St. James, St. John The Baptist and Upper Lafourche Parishes. * WHEN...from 10 PM this evening to 10 AM CST Monday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...While the Wind Advisory has expired, a few wind gusts to 40 mph will be possible on elevated roadways for the next few hours.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Orleans; Upper Jefferson; Upper Plaquemines; Upper St. Bernard; Western Orleans
